subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|か|o1=り}}
Originally the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of classical verb {{m|ja|借る|tr=karu||to borrow}}, now also the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei}} of modern verb {{m|ja|借りる|tr=kariru||to borrow}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Antonyms
subSections.text: {{sense|borrowing, debt}} {{ja-r|貸し|かし}}: [[lending]], a [[credit]], a [[loan]] {{qualifier|for the lender, not the borrower}}
